segments.contentZh: 我是一滴小水滴，住在大海裡。
segments.contentEn: I'm a little water drop, living in the ocean.

segments.contentZh: 有一天，太陽出來了，把小水滴曬得暖暖的。
segments.contentEn: One day, the sun came out and warmed the water drop.

segments.contentZh: 哇！我的身體變輕了，我飛起來了！
segments.contentEn: Wow! My body became lighter, I'm flying up!

segments.contentZh: 小水滴變成了水蒸氣，飛到天空中。
segments.contentEn: The water drop became water vapor and flew into the sky.

segments.contentZh: 在天空中，小水滴和其他水滴們聚在一起，變成了雲。
segments.contentEn: In the sky, the drop joined other drops and became a cloud.

segments.contentZh: 天氣變冷了，我又變重了，我要下雨了！
segments.contentEn: The weather got cold, I became heavy again, I'm going to rain!

segments.contentZh: 小水滴從天上掉下來，變成雨水，滋潤了大地。
segments.contentEn: The drop fell from the sky as rain, watering the earth.

segments.contentZh: 最後，小水滴順著小溪，又回到了大海，準備下一次旅行。
segments.contentEn: Finally, the drop flowed through streams back to the ocean, ready for the next journey.
